sections.heading: 01|Driver training school definitions
sections.text: Effective:October 3, 2023Latest Legislation:House Bill 33 - 135th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in this chapter:(A) "Beginning driver" means any person being trained to drive a particular motor vehicle who has not been previously licensed

sections.heading: 06, inclusive, of the Revised Code, do not apply to any person giving driver training lessons without charge, to employers maintaining driver training schools without charge for their employees only, nor to schools or classes conducted by colleges and universities  for regularly enrolled full time s
sections.text: 06, inclusive, of the Revised Code, do not apply to any person giving driver training lessons without charge, to employers maintaining driver training schools without charge for their employees only, nor to schools or classes conducted by colleges and universities for regularly enrolled full time students as a part of a normal program for such institutions.
